name: Weave the Prince
description:
A message from the prince arrived in town:

 ” The most popular merchant of the zone will sell me his clothes for my wedding… A huge reward will be given”

 In a colorful Arab environment, a simple artisan accepts the challenge given by the prince.

Sell clothes to the inhabitants is the key to become popular and the artisan immediately starts to buy raw materials to produce clothes in his laboratory. Price changing, day, night, and other merchants will counteract the main character success.

 Weave the prince is a single run management video game for PC. The beauty of the environment is followed by player’s skills needed to manage game elements to become the most popular merchant of the market.

FEATURES:

  • Buy raw material
  • Produce clothes with your workbench
  • Sell more than the other merchant of the market
  • Become the most popular merchant of Arabia
  • Playable with one hand only!
  • Relax through Arabian sound and simple interface
  • Learn the best time to sell your clothes
